}

	scene "scenes/NamVet/NiceShot14.vcd"  //
}

{
	criteria ConceptPlayerNiceShot IsNotCoughing IsNamVet IssuerNotSoClose IsC6M3_Port IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsWorldTalkNamVet IsNotSpeaking ChanceToFire70Percent
	Response L4D1PlayerNiceShotNamVet
}

{
	criteria ConceptRemark IsNamVet IsFarm05_path09 IsNotSaidFarm05_Path09 IsNotCoughing NotInCombat IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsSubjectNear300 IsWorldTalkNamVet IsNotSpeakingWeight0 AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival
	ApplyContext "SaidFarm05_path09:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld

}

Response L4D1HealThanksNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Thanks04.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" then Subject YouAreWelcome foo:0 -0.724 //Thanks.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Thanks05.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" then Subject YouAreWelcome foo:0 -0.915 //Thank you.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Thanks06.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" then Subject YouAreWelcome foo:0 -1.257 //Thanks a lot.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Thanks07.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" then Subject YouAreWelcome foo:0 0.3 //I owe ya one.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Thanks08.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" then Subject YouAreWelcome foo:0 0.3 //That's one I owe you.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Thanks11.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" then Subject YouAreWelcome foo:0 0.3 //That wasn't necessary, but thanks.
}
Rule L4D1HealThanksNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptHealedByFriend IsNotCoughing  IsNamVet IsTalk IsTalkNamVet SubjectIsNotNamVet IsWorldTalkNamVet
	ApplyContext "TalkNamVet:1:2"
	Response L4D1HealThanksNamVet
}

Rule L4D1ReviveThanksNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptRevivedByFriend IsNotCoughing IsNamVet
	ApplyContext "TalkNamVet:1:2"
	Response L4D1HealThanksNamVet
}

{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Hurrah20.vcd"  //You people are gettin' good.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReactionPositive05.vcd"  //[chuckles and giggles]
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReactionPositive10.vcd"  //Out standing
}

{
	criteria ConceptHurrahAlso IsNotCoughing  IsNamVet IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsNotSaidHurrahAlso IsBotIsAvailable IsWorldTalkNamVet
	ApplyContext "SaidHurrahAlso:1:5"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response BotHurrahAlsoNamVet
}

Response L4D1AutoYouAreWelcomeNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/YouAreWelcome01.vcd"  //Sure thing.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/YouAreWelcome02.vcd"  //Well, you're welcome.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/YouAreWelcome04.vcd"  //Hey, no problem
	scene "scenes/NamVet/YouAreWelcome05.vcd"  //No problem.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/YouAreWelcome08.vcd"  //Sure thing, kid.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/YouAreWelcome10.vcd"  //Yeah, yeah, yeah.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/YouAreWelcome11.vcd"  //Don't get too used to it.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/YouAreWelcome12.vcd"  //Don't mention it.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/YouAreWelcome14.vcd" odds 5 //Yeah, okay, it don't mean we're married now
	scene "scenes/NamVet/YouAreWelcome15.vcd" odds 5 //Don't expect a hug
}
Rule L4D1AutoYouAreWelcomeNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptYouAreWelcome IsNotCoughing IsNamVet IsTalk IsTalkNamVet TimeSinceGroupInCombat05 IsNotSpeaking IsWorldTalkNamVet
	Response L4D1AutoYouAreWelcomeNamVet
}

Response L4D1BotAttentionBattleNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ImWithYou01.vcd" //I got your six.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ImWithYou02.vcd" //Right behind you.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ImWithYou03.vcd" //I'm with ya.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ImWithYou04.vcd" //I got your back.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ImWithYou05.vcd" //I'm right behind you.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ImWithYou06.vcd" //Right behind you.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LeadOn01.vcd"  //You go ahead, I'll follow you
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LeadOn02.vcd"  //You take the lead
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LeadOn03.vcd"  //Go ahead
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LeadOn04.vcd"  //You're on point
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LeadOn05.vcd"  //I'll follow you
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LeadOn06.vcd"  //Lead on.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LeadOn07.vcd"  //You go ahead, I'll cover you.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LeadOn08.vcd"  //Take the point.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/PlayerTransitionClose02.vcd"  //This shit's gettin' old.
}

{
	criteria ConceptSurvivorBotNoteHumanAttention IsNotCoughing IsNamVet IsNotBotAttention IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsNotIncapacitated IsInBattlefield TimeSinceGroupInCombat20 IsWorldTalkNamVet IsNotSpeakingWeight0

}

Response C7M1IntroNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO01.vcd"  then Any C7M1_saferoom01 foo:0 .1 //End of the line, people!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO03.vcd"  then Any C7M1_saferoom02 foo:0 .1 //Alright, let's move! No stragglers!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO04.vcd"  then Any C7M1_saferoom02 foo:0 .1 //Alright, let's move! Everyone stay together!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO07.vcd"  then Any C7M1_saferoom04 foo:0 .1 //Alright, everybody, remember: we're lookin' for a sail boat.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO10.vcd"  //Alright, everybody, remember: we're lookin' for a sail boat. I aim to get to the Keys, and I ain't stoppin' for gas.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO11.vcd"  then Any C7M1_saferoom06 foo:0 .1 //We gotta find a sail boat.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO22.vcd"  then Any C7M1_saferoom10a foo:0 .1 //Zoey. You ready to head for the Keys?
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO25.vcd"  then Any C7M1_saferoom10a foo:0 .1 //Zoey. You ready to head to the Keys?
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO26.vcd"  then Any C7M1_saferoom11 foo:0 .1 //Zoey. You still mad?
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO33.vcd"  then Any C7M1_saferoom16 foo:0 .1 //End of the line. Let's move.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO36.vcd"  then Any C7M1_saferoom17 foo:0 .1 //Almost there, people! We just gotta find a boat and we'll be in the Keys.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO37.vcd"  then Any C7M1_saferoom18 foo:0 .1 //That's as far as the train's taking us. If we're gonna get to the Keys, we'll need a boat.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO40.vcd"  then Any C7M1_saferoom21 foo:0 .1 //Let's find a boat that can make it to the Gulf.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO43.vcd"  then Any C7M1_saferoom23 foo:0 .1 //End of the line sweeties.  Grab some gear and let's go.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO46.vcd"  then Any C7M1_saferoom25 foo:0 .1 //The train rides over, time to get back to walking.
}

{
	criteria ConceptIntroSacrifice IsNamVet IsNotSaidCXM1Intro IsNotAlone IsNotVersus AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival

	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3STARTINGGENERATORS06.vcd" predelay "0.5,1" //Let's go! Let's go!

	Response C7M3SafeRoomNamVet
}

// Call For Rescue
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Response L4D1PlayerCallForRescueNamVet
{
	speak "Player.NamVet_CallForRescue01" noscene  //Anybody out there?
	speak "Player.NamVet_CallForRescue02" noscene  //Come on people, let me out!
	speak "Player.NamVet_CallForRescue05" noscene  //Can anyone hear me?
	speak "Player.NamVet_CallForRescue06" noscene  //Let me out!
	speak "Player.NamVet_CallForRescue07" noscene  //Hey! Can anybody hear me?
	speak "Player.NamVet_CallForRescue08" noscene  //Get over here and let me out!
	speak "Player.NamVet_CallForRescue09" noscene  //God dammit, I'm trapped in here!
	speak "Player.NamVet_CallForRescue10" noscene  //I can't see a damn thing in here.  Let me out!
	speak "Player.NamVet_CallForRescue11" noscene  //This is such horseshit. Is anybody even out there?
	speak "Player.NamVet_CallForRescue12" noscene  //I know you can hear me, goddammit. Let me the hell out!
}
Rule L4D1PlayerCallForRescueNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptCallForRescue IsNamVet IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsWorldTalkNamVet HasNotCalledForRescue
	ApplyContext "CalledForRescue:1:5"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1PlayerCallForRescueNamVet
}

	ApplyContext "_auto_TimerLockA:1:10,_auto_TimerLockNamVet:1:30"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1SurvivorFinalVehicleInsideRunwayNamVet
}

Response L4D1SurvivorFinalVehicleSpottedBoatNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ArriveBoatInitial01.vcd"  then any EmphaticArriveRun foo:0 -2.418 //That's the boat! Time to bug out!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ArriveBoatInitial02.vcd"  then any EmphaticArriveRun foo:0 -1.908 //Allright, the boat's here! Let's go!
}
Rule L4D1SurvivorFinalVehicleSpottedBoatNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptFinalVehicleSpotted IsNamVet IsDeathToll5 _auto_IsFinaleStarted
	ApplyContext "_auto_TimerLockA:1:10,_auto_TimerLockNamVet:1:30,_auto_Finale:2:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1SurvivorFinalVehicleSpottedBoatNamVet
}

Response L4D1SurvivorFinalVehicleSpottedRooftopNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ArriveChopperInitial01.vcd"  then any EmphaticArriveRun foo:0 -2.946 //Our chopper's here! Let's get the hell out of dodge.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ArriveChopperInitial02.vcd"  then any EmphaticArriveRun foo:0 -1.715 //The bird's here! Let's go!
	print " " then pilot HospitalRadioChopperHere foo:0 0 //
}

{

	applycontexttoworld

}

	print " "  then orator_plane_radio ConceptBlockPlaneFull foo:0 0 //
}

Response L4D1PlayerShotCarNotNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Swears03.vcd" predelay "0.1,0.7" //Son of a bitch.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Swears12.vcd" predelay "0.1,0.7" //Ah shit.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/SwearCoupdeGrace02.vcd" predelay "0.1,0.7" //Go to hell.
}
Rule L4D1PlayerShotCarNotNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptPanicEvent IsNamVet IsNotCoughing IsTalk IsTalkNamVet SubjectIsNotNamVet ChanceToFire40Percent IsCarAlarm IsWorldTalkNamVet
	ApplyContext "Saidremark_caralarm:1:300"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1PlayerShotCarNotNamVet
}

Response L4D1PlayerShotCarNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Swears09.vcd" predelay "0.1,0.7" //God DAMMIT.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Swears04.vcd" predelay "0.1,0.7" //Bull-frickin-horseshit.
}

{
	criteria ConceptPanicEvent IsNamVet IsNotCoughing IsTalk IsTalkNamVet SubjectIsNamVet IsCarAlarm IsWorldTalkNamVet
	ApplyContext "Saidremark_caralarm:1:300"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1PlayerShotCarNamVet
}

Response L4D1ResponseSoftDispleasureSwearNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReactionApprehensive01.vcd"  //I have a bad feeling about this
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReactionApprehensive04.vcd"  //I do not like this one bit.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReactionNegative01.vcd"  //Uh oh
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReactionNegative02.vcd"  //Christ
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReactionNegative03.vcd"  //Gee-zus
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Swears03.vcd"  //Son of a bitch.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Swears07.vcd"  //Ah hell.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Swears08.vcd"  //Dammit.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Swears16.vcd"  //Ah shit.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Swears19.vcd"  //What a crock a' shit...
}
Rule L4D1ResponseSoftDispleasureSwearNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptResponseSoftDispleasureSwear IsNamVet IsNotCoughing NotInCombat IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IssuerMediumClose IsWorldTalkNamVet
	Response L4D1ResponseSoftDispleasureSwearNamVet
}

{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/blank.vcd"  then Subject AskForHealth foo:0 0 //
}

{
	criteria ConceptPlayerLookHere IsNotCoughing IsNamVet IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsNotSmartLookAuto HasASubject IsSubjectDistNear400 NoHasPainPills NoHasFirstAidKit IsNotHealthy NotInCombat IsNotSaidAskForHealth IsWorldTalkNamVet
	ApplyContext "SaidAskForHealth:1:10"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1SurvivorAskForHealthNamVet
}

	criteria ConceptPlayerSpotWeapon IsNotCoughing IsNamVet IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsSmartLookAuto IsNotInSafeSpot IsNotAlone IsNotSaidSpotWeapons IsNotSaidSpot IsLaserSights IsWorldTalkNamVet IsNotSpeakingWeight0
	ApplyContext "SaidSpotWeapons:1:5,SaidSpot:1:20"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response SurvivorSpottedAdrenalineNamVet
}

Rule SurvivorBotPickupLaserSightsSpottedNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerPickup IsNotCoughing IsNamVet IsPickedUpLaserSights IsNotSpeaking IsBotIsAvailable IsNotInSafeSpot IsNotInStartArea IsNotInCheckpoint IsNotSaidSpotWeapons IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsWorldTalkNamVet _auto_NotSpottedVehicle
	ApplyContext "SaidSpotWeapons:1:5,SaidSpot:1:20"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response SurvivorSpottedAdrenalineNamVet
}

	scene "scenes/NamVet/AlertGiveItem06.vcd"  //Here, I saved this for you.

Rule L4D1PlayerFaultFriendlyFireNamVet
{
	criteria IsFaultConcept IsFaultFriendlyFire IsNamVet
	ApplyContext "SaidFaultFriendlyFireNamVet:1:0.1,SaidFaultFriendlyFire:1:0.1,ShotTeammateNamVet:1:6"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response NoResponse
}

Response L4D1PlayerFriendlyFireNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/FriendlyFire01.vcd"  //Ahh! That hurt!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/FriendlyFire02.vcd"  //Ah! Knock it off!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/FriendlyFire03.vcd" odds 2 //Do I look like a target?
	scene "scenes/NamVet/FriendlyFire04.vcd" odds 2 //You know, I would appreciate it IF YOU'D STOP SHOOTING ME!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/FriendlyFire05.vcd"  //Watch where you're shooting!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/FriendlyFire06.vcd"  //Goddamn it, watch your fire!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/FriendlyFire07.vcd" odds 5 //Jesus H Christ, I'm on your side.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/FriendlyFire08.vcd"  //Watch where you're shooting!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/FriendlyFire10.vcd"  //Watch where you point that thing!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/FriendlyFire11.vcd"  //Watch where you're shooting!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/FriendlyFire12.vcd"  //Do not shoot me!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/FriendlyFire13.vcd" odds 5 //Goddamit, watch where you're shooting!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/FriendlyFire14.vcd"  //Check your fire!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/FriendlyFire15.vcd"  //Secure that weapon!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/FriendlyFire16.vcd"  //Hold your fire!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/FriendlyFire17.vcd" odds 5 //Who's side are you on, kid?
}
Rule L4D1PlayerFriendlyFireNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerFriendlyFire IsNotCoughing IsNamVet IsNotFriendlyFire IsNotIncapacitated IsNotOnThirdStrike IsDamageTypeBullet IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsWorldTalkNamVet IsNotZombiePresentTank
	ApplyContext "FriendlyFire:1:10"
	Response L4D1PlayerFriendlyFireNamVet
}

	Response PlayerToTheRescueRosNamVet

Response SurvivorJockeyHurtMajorNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/FallShort03.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -1.001 //[Yelp]
	scene "scenes/NamVet/GettingRevived12.vcd" odds 1 then all commentjockey foo:0 -1.365 //[confused from hit on head] Mother?
	scene "scenes/NamVet/HurtCritical01.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -0.535 //[pain noise - loud major pain]
	scene "scenes/NamVet/HurtCritical07.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -0.732 //[pain noise - loud major pain]
	scene "scenes/NamVet/HurtMajor01.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -0.712 //[pain noise - ahh]
	scene "scenes/NamVet/HurtMajor06.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -0.666 //[pain noise - ugh]
	scene "scenes/NamVet/HurtMinor02.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -0.677 //[pain noise - short minor pain]
	scene "scenes/NamVet/HurtMinor03.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -0.691 //[pain noise - short minor pain]
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReactionNegative04.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -1.900 //[Frustration sound]
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ScreamWhilePounced01.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -0.894 //GET IT OFF!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ScreamWhilePounced02.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -1.452 //GET IT OFF GET IT OFF!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ScreamWhilePounced03.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -1.133 //GET IT OFF!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Shoved03.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -0.860 //[Reaction to body hits - uhs ahs]
}
Rule SurvivorJockeyHurtMajorNamVet
{
	criteria IsSurvivor InPain IsMajorPain IsNamVet IsTalk IsTalkNamVet SubjectIsJockey IsNotSaidBeenJockeyedNamVet IsWorldTalkNamVet IsBeingJockeyed
	ApplyContext "SaidBeenJockeyedNamVet:1:6,TalkNamVet:1:6"
	applycontexttoworld

}

{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Help01.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 -1.883 //People, I need some help!

	scene "scenes/NamVet/Help08.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 -1.042 //Little help!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Help11.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 -2.231 //Need some help over here!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Help13.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 -1.953 //A little help please.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Help15.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 -1.583 //I'm in trouble!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Help16.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 -1.380 //Little help!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Help17.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 -2.535 //I need a hand, people!
}

// Near Finale

	scene "scenes/NamVet/FinaleAhead02.vcd"  //We're almost out of here!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/FinaleAhead03.vcd"  //Okay, people, we're almost there. Let's keep moving!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/FinaleAhead04.vcd"  //Keep it together people. We're almost home free.
}

{
	criteria ConceptPlayerNearFinale IsNotCoughing IsNamVet IsNotSaidFinaleAhead NotInCombat IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsNotIncapacitated IsWorldTalkNamVet AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival
	ApplyContext "SaidFinaleAhead:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1SurvivorNearFinaleNamVet
}

{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/WorldHospital0503.vcd"  //Let's find that radio.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/WorldHospital0504.vcd"  //Let's find the radio and get a hold of that pilot.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/WorldHospital0513.vcd"  //Let's find that radio.

{

	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1SurvivorFinaleAheadC8M5NamVet
}

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Near Checkpoint
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Response SurvivorNearCheckpointNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/SafeSpotAhead07.vcd"  then any SafeSpotAheadResponse foo:0 -1.899 //Safe house ahead!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/SafeSpotAhead08.vcd"  then any SafeSpotAheadResponse foo:0 -1.579 //Safe house!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/SafeSpotAhead02.vcd"  then any SafeSpotAheadResponse foo:0 0.3 //There's a safe spot just ahead.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/SafeSpotAhead05.vcd"  then any SafeSpotAheadResponse foo:0 0.3 //There's a safe place up aheaad.
}
Rule SurvivorNearCheckpointNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerNearCheckpoint IsNotCoughing IsNamVet IsNotSaidSafeSpotAhead IsNotAlone IsNotInCheckpoint IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsWorldTalkNamVet AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival
	ApplyContext "SaidSafeSpotAhead:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response SurvivorNearCheckpointNamVet
}

Response SurvivorNearCheckpointC8M2NamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/WorldHospital0220.vcd"  //We have to keep moving down the street.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/WorldHospital0224.vcd"  //Safehouse up in the pawnshop.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/WorldHospital0225.vcd"  //Get to the pawnshop people!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/WorldHospital0226.vcd"  //Keep moving, safehouse ahead!
}

Response SafeSpotAheadResponseNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/SafeSpotAheadReaction01.vcd"  //Finally!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/SafeSpotAheadReaction02.vcd"  //Thank God.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/SafeSpotAheadReaction03.vcd"  //'Bout time!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/SafeSpotAheadReaction04.vcd"  //Hallelujah!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/SafeSpotAheadReaction05.vcd"  //Well it's about damn time.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/SafeSpotAheadReaction06.vcd"  //I could use a damn break.
}
Rule SafeSpotAheadResponseNamVet
{
	criteria IsNamVet IsNotCoughing NotInCombat IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IssuerClose ConceptSafeSpotAheadResponse ChanceToFire30Percent IsWorldTalkNamVet
	Response SafeSpotAheadResponseNamVet
}

	scene "scenes/NamVet/NiceJob17.vcd"  //Good. Very Good.

	scene "scenes/NamVet/NiceJob19.vcd"  //That was some piece of work.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/NiceJob20.vcd"  //Pretty damn good.

	scene "scenes/NamVet/NiceJob22.vcd"  //You did good, kid.
}

	scene "scenes/NamVet/No06.vcd"  //Negative.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/No07.vcd"  //Not a chance.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/No08.vcd"  //No.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/No09.vcd"  //No.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/No10.vcd"  //No.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/No11.vcd"  //No possible way.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/No14.vcd"  //I don't think so.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/No15.vcd"  //Absolutely not.
}

	scene "scenes/NamVet/Sorry07.vcd"  //Sorry about that.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Sorry08.vcd"  //My fault!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Sorry09.vcd"  //Won't happen again.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Sorry10.vcd"  //I regret that mistake.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Sorry11.vcd"  //Ah, hell, I'm gettin too old for this shit
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Sorry12.vcd"  //That was careless of me.
}

	scene "scenes/NamVet/Thanks06.vcd"  //Thanks a lot.

	scene "scenes/NamVet/Thanks08.vcd"  //That's one I owe you.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Thanks09.vcd"  //'ppreciate it.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Thanks10.vcd"  //You didn't have to do that
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Thanks11.vcd"  //That wasn't necessary, but thanks.

Response PlayerHurrahNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Hurrah02.vcd"  //We're doing pretty goddamn good. Don't let it go to your head.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Hurrah03.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -1.730 //GREAT JOB, PEOPLE!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Hurrah05.vcd"  //We're going to be okay.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Hurrah20.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -1.801 //You people are gettin' good.
}

{
	criteria ConceptPlayerHurrah IsNotCoughing IsNamVet IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsWorldTalkNamVet
	Response PlayerHurrahNamVet
}

Response GasPourDoneSCNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Taunt01.vcd"  //[loud, evil laugh]
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Taunt02.vcd"  //[loud, evil laugh]
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Taunt07.vcd"  //[loud, evil laugh]
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Taunt08.vcd"  //[loud, evil laugh]
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Taunt09.vcd"  //[loud, evil laugh]
	scene "scenes/NamVet/WorldHospital0210.vcd"  //This seemed too easy.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/WorldSmallTown0411.vcd"  //They didn't have a chance.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Hurrah03.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -1.730 //GREAT JOB, PEOPLE!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Hurrah20.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -1.801 //You people are gettin' good.
}
Rule GasPourDoneSCNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerPourFinished IsNamVet IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsWorldTalkNamVet IsScavenge ScoreDoneSC
	ApplyContext "Talk:1:3"
	Response GasPourDoneSCNamVet
}

Response GasPourSCNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/CoverMe01.vcd" //Cover me!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/CoverMe02.vcd" //Cover me.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/CoverMe03.vcd" //Watch my back
	scene "scenes/NamVet/CoverMe04.vcd" //Watch my back.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/CoverMe05.vcd"  //Cover me.
}

{
	criteria ConceptPlayerPourStarted IsNamVet IsTalk IsNotAlone IsTalkNamVet IsWorldTalkNamVet _auto_NotNoGasPourLine
	ApplyContext "TalkNamVet:1:2"
	Response GasPourSCNamVet
}

	scene "scenes/NamVet/KillConfirmation02.vcd"  //Got it
	scene "scenes/NamVet/KillConfirmation08.vcd"  //Got it

	ApplyContext "SaidGrabbingCan:1:8"

}

	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReactionNegative07.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //God dammit

	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReactionNegative10.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //Dammit
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Swears04.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //Bull-frickin-horseshit.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Swears09.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //God DAMMIT.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Swears10.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //Mother of mercy.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Swears19.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //What a crock a' shit...
}

{
	criteria ConceptPlayerShotGasCan IsNamVet IsNotSaidPlayerShotGasCan IsScavenge
	ApplyContext "SaidPlayerShotGasCan:1:10"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response PlayerShotGasCanNamVet
}

	scene "scenes/NamVet/MoveOn12.vcd"  //Let's go, people!
}

	criteria ConceptSurvivorLeavingCheckpoint IsNamVet IsNotAlone IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsWorldTalkNamVet IsScavenge IsNotSaidLeavingSafeArea
	ApplyContext "SaidLeavingSafeArea:1:0"

{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/KillConfirmation01.vcd"  then Any PlayerNiceShot foo:0 0 //Got 'em
	scene "scenes/NamVet/KillConfirmation02.vcd"  then Any PlayerNiceShot foo:0 0 //Got it
	scene "scenes/NamVet/KillConfirmation03.vcd"  then Any PlayerNiceShot foo:0 0 //He's dead
	scene "scenes/NamVet/KillConfirmation05.vcd"  then Any PlayerNiceShot foo:0 0 //Got 'em
	scene "scenes/NamVet/KillConfirmation06.vcd"  then Any PlayerNiceShot foo:0 0 //Got 'em
	scene "scenes/NamVet/KillConfirmation07.vcd"  then Any PlayerNiceShot foo:0 0 //Got 'em
	scene "scenes/NamVet/KillConfirmation08.vcd"  then Any PlayerNiceShot foo:0 0 //Got it
}

{
	criteria ConceptKilledZombie IsNotCoughing IsNamVet SubjectIsNotTank SubjectIsNotAWitch IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsSubjectFar300 ChanceToFire40Percent IsWorldTalkNamVet IsNotSpeakingWeight0 _auto_NotSpottedVehicle
	Response L4D1PlayerKillConfirmationNamVet
}

	scene "scenes/NamVet/KillConfirmation06.vcd"  //Got 'em

	scene "scenes/NamVet/KillConfirmation08.vcd"  //Got it

Rule L4D1PlayerKillTankConfirmationNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptKilledZombie IsNotCoughing IsNamVet IsTalk IsTalkNamVet SubjectIsTank IsNotSaidTankDead IsNotAlone IsNotIncapacitated IsRocking IsWorldTalkNamVet _auto_NotFinaleStarted
	ApplyContext "SaidTankDead:1:60,TalkNamVet:1:5"
	applycontexttoworld

	scene "scenes/NamVet/GoingToDie08.vcd"  //[to self] goddamn horseshit.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/GoingToDie09.vcd"  //It's not lookin' good for me.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/GoingToDie10.vcd"  //I'm not feelin' too hot.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/GoingToDie11.vcd"  //Ah shit, I'm not doin' too good here.

	scene "scenes/NamVet/GoingToDie13.vcd"  //Christ, I'm messed up.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/GoingToDie14.vcd"  //[sharp intake of breath followed by grunt]
	scene "scenes/NamVet/GoingToDie16.vcd"  //I feel awful.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/GoingToDie17.vcd"  //God damn it, I am seriously fubar.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/GoingToDie18.vcd"  //[pain sound followed by two grunts]
	scene "scenes/NamVet/GoingToDie21.vcd"  //[pain sound] I think I'm goin' home in a box
	scene "scenes/NamVet/GoingToDie22.vcd"  //I feel like hell.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/GoingToDie26.vcd"  //Dammit, I'm bleeding out.

	scene "scenes/NamVet/GoingToDieLight02.vcd"  //Ah shit, I ain't feelin' right.

	scene "scenes/NamVet/GoingToDieLight04.vcd"  //This just ain't my day...

	scene "scenes/NamVet/GoingToDieLight07.vcd"  //<wincing pain noise> Hell with this.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/GoingToDieLight08.vcd" odds 2 //Hell, I was too old for this shit fifteen years ago.
}

Response SacrificeSuccessfulNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE01.vcd"  //My job's done. Have at me, you bastards.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE02.vcd"  //My job's done. Let's see what you got you big, dumb sons-of-bitches!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE03.vcd"  //My friends are safe. There's nothing you bastards can do to me now.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE04.vcd"  //You monkeys ain't gonna spoil this.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE05.vcd"  //You should have brought more tanks with you.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE06.vcd"  //You're too late. They're safe.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE07.vcd"  //You sons of bitches took everything. But you ain't takin' them.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE08.vcd"  //You're too late.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE09.vcd"  //*laughs* I'm ready...
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE10.vcd"  //I'll see peace back on Earth... *coughs* if I gotta murder every one of you bastards... with m-, with my BARE, GODDAMN HANDS! *Final laugh*
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE11.vcd"  //Awwwwww, horseshit.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE12.vcd"  //You want me? Come and set it. I'm just scars and tar anyways, but you didn't get them, did you, you sons of bitches?
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE13.vcd"  //Heheh. I guess you can't un-make how things end up. This is all just how it is. But you never got 'em, did ya? They're safe. And that's just fine.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE14.vcd"  //I gotta admit, this ain't how I pictured it. Good enough... Good enough...
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE15.vcd"  //
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE16.vcd"  //I had a good run, knowing they're safe. I wouldn't have changed a thing.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE17.vcd"  //
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE18.vcd"  //That felt like no time at all.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE19.vcd"  //That all you brought?
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE20.vcd"  //If I'd known how many sons of bitches there were when we started, I guess I would have saved the shoe leather and fought you there.
}

{
	criteria ConceptPlayerIncapacitated IsNotCoughing IsNamVet IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsLastGenerator SacrificedNamVet ismapc7m3_port _auto_IsSaidC7M3BridgeLeap _auto_IsC7M3FinalPress

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Vocalizer - Danger
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Response L4D1PlayerLedgeHangEndNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LedgeHangEnd01.vcd"  //I'M SLIPPING! PULL ME UP!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LedgeHangEnd02.vcd"  //I'M LOSING MY GRIP! GET OVER HERE!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LedgeHangEnd03.vcd"  //I CAN'T HOLD ON - I'M GONNA FALL!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LedgeHangEnd04.vcd"  //HELP ME! I'm about to take a redball into the ground!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LedgeHangEnd05.vcd"  //I'M GONNA FALL!
}
Rule L4D1PlayerLedgeHangEndNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerLedgeHangEnd IsNotCoughing IsNamVet IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsWorldTalkNamVet
	ApplyContext "TalkNamvet:1:5"
	Response L4D1PlayerLedgeHangEndNamVet
}

Response L4D1PlayerLedgeHangMiddleNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LedgeHangMiddle01.vcd"  //Ah christ, somebody pull me up!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LedgeHangMiddle02.vcd"  //I need some help, here.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LedgeHangMiddle03.vcd"  //Dammit, I need a hand here!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LedgeHangMiddle04.vcd"  //Pull me up, people.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LedgeHangMiddle05.vcd"  //I need a hand up!
}
Rule L4D1PlayerLedgeHangMiddleNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerLedgeHangMiddle IsNotCoughing IsNamVet IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsWorldTalkNamVet
	ApplyContext "TalkNamvet:1:5"
	Response L4D1PlayerLedgeHangMiddleNamVet
}

Response L4D1PlayerLedgeHangStartNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LedgeHangStart01.vcd"  //I need a hand up!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LedgeHangStart02.vcd"  //Somembody pull me up!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LedgeHangStart03.vcd"  //Godammit, I'm hangin' off a ledge over here.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LedgeHangStart04.vcd"  //Somebody needs to get over here and pull me up!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LedgeHangStart05.vcd"  //Hey, people, I'm hangin' off a ledge over here!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LedgeHangStart06.vcd"  //Somebody come pull me up!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LedgeHangStart07.vcd"  //I'm gettin' too old for this hangin' shit.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LedgeHangStart08.vcd"  //Somebody come help me up!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LedgeHangStart09.vcd"  //Somebody come grab me up off this ledge.
}
Rule L4D1PlayerLedgeHangStartNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerLedgeHangStart IsNotCoughing IsNamVet IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsWorldTalkNamVet
	ApplyContext "TalkNamvet:1:5"
	Response L4D1PlayerLedgeHangStartNamVet
}


//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Vocalizer - Death
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Response L4D1SurvivorFirstDeathNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/DoubleDeathResponse01.vcd" predelay ".5,1.25" //This is goin' to hell in a handbasket real fast!
}
Rule L4D1SurvivorFirstDeathNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptSurvivorDied IsNotCoughing SurvivorDiedNearEnough IsSurvivor IsNamVet IsEveryoneAlive IsNotSaidSomeoneDied IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsWorldTalkNamVet
	ApplyContext "SaidSomeoneDied:1:10"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1SurvivorFirstDeathNamVet
}

Response L4D1DoubleDeathNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/DoubleDeathResponse04.vcd" predelay ".5,1.25" //It's just the two of us now, kid.
}
Rule L4D1DoubleDeath2NamVet
{
	criteria ConceptSurvivorDied IsNotCoughing SurvivorDiedNearEnough IsSurvivor IsNamVet IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsWithOnlyThree IsNotIncapacitated IsWorldTalkNamVet
	ApplyContext "SaidSomeoneDied:1:10"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1DoubleDeathNamVet
}

Response L4D1DeathOneNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/DoubleDeathResponse02.vcd" predelay ".5,1.25" //I didn't sign up for this shit!
}
Rule L4D1DeathOneNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptSurvivorDied IsNotCoughing SurvivorDiedNearEnough IsSurvivor IsNamVet IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsWithTwo IsNotSaidFaultFriendlyFireGeneral IsNotIncapacitated IsWorldTalkNamVet
	Response L4D1DeathOneNamVet
}

Response L4D1TeamKillNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/TeamKillAccident01.vcd" predelay ".5,1.25" //Be careful!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/TeamKillAccident02.vcd" predelay ".5,1.25" //Have you lost your mind?
}
Rule L4D1TeamKillNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptSurvivorDied IsNotCoughing SurvivorDiedReallyClose IsNamVet IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsNotSaidSomeoneDied IsSaidFaultFriendlyFireGeneral IsNotSaidFaultFriendlyFireNamVet IsNotIncapacitated IsWorldTalkNamVet
	ApplyContext "SaidSomeoneDied:1:10"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1TeamKillNamVet
}

Response L4D1SurvivorPickupM60NamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Hurrah18.vcd"  //Those bastards are in for a big surprise.
}
Rule L4D1SurvivorPickupM60NamVet
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerPickup IsNotCoughing IsNamVet IsPickedUpM60 IsNotSpeaking NotPickedUpItem IsNotInSafeSpot IsNotInStartArea IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsWorldTalkNamVet _auto_NotSpottedVehicle
	ApplyContext "PickedUpItem:1:30"
	Response L4D1SurvivorPickupM60NamVet
}

	scene "scenes/NamVet/TakeAssaultRifle04.vcd"  //An assault rifle! Man, this takes me back.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/TakeAssaultRifle05.vcd"  //I'm grabbin' an assault rifle.

}

Response L4D1PlayerGettingRevivedNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/GettingRevived01.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -1.600 //I'm okay.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/GettingRevived02.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -1.685 //I'm allright.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/GettingRevived03.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -3.285 //[groan]
	scene "scenes/NamVet/GettingRevived04.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -1.451 //Hell if I know.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/GettingRevived05.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -2.417 //Most of this blood ain't mine.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/GettingRevived06.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -1.685 //[groan2]
	scene "scenes/NamVet/GettingRevived07.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -1.856 //I'll make it.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/GettingRevived08.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -1.216 //I'll live.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/GettingRevived09.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -1.663 //Hell, I'll live.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/GettingRevived10.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -1.408 //I've had worse.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/GettingRevived13.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -2.204 //Well, I ain't *good*.
}
Rule L4D1PlayerGettingRevivedNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptReviveFriendDown IsNotCoughing IsNamVet IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsWorldTalkNamVet
	Response L4D1PlayerGettingRevivedNamVet
}

Response L4D1PlayerHealOtherNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/HealOther01.vcd"  //Let me heal you up
	scene "scenes/NamVet/HealOther02.vcd"  //Hold still, I can heal you
	scene "scenes/NamVet/HealOther03.vcd"  //Hold on, let me patch you up
	scene "scenes/NamVet/HealOther04.vcd"  //Lemme heal ya up.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/HealOther05.vcd"  //Hold up, I'll heal ya.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/HealOther06.vcd"  //Quit moving, I'll heal ya.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/HealOther07.vcd"  //Stop squirmin', I'm gonna heal ya.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/HealOther08.vcd"  //Hold still, I'm gonna heal ya.
}

{
	criteria ConceptPlayerHealingOther IsNotCoughing  IsNamVet IsTalk IsTalkNamVet NotInIntenseCombat IsWorldTalkNamVet
	ApplyContext "TalkNamVet:1:5"
	Response L4D1PlayerHealOtherNamVet
}

	forceweight 30

}

Response L4D1PlayerReviveFriendNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriend01.vcd"  //Hold still, hold still. I'm gonna get you back on your feet and then we gotta move.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriend02.vcd"  //Okay. Allright, now. Come on kid, shake it off and let's get moving.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriend03.vcd"  //Ah hell, it looks a lot worse than it is. C'mon - you gotta get up and walk it off.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriend04.vcd"  //Probably stings like hell, but it ain't gonna kill ya. Up and at'em, soldier! Time to move.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriend05.vcd"  //There's a lot of blood, but you're not missin' anything important. Come on, get up, let's get moving!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriend06.vcd"  //Hold still, hold still. I'm gonna get you back on your feet and then we gotta move.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriend07.vcd"  //Okay. Allright, now. Come on kid, shake it off, let's get moving.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriend08.vcd"  //Take it easy, kid. I'm gonna get you back on your feet and fighting.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriend09.vcd"  //Hell, kid, they just winged ya. Come on, back on your feet and let's get moving.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriend10.vcd"  //Here we go - back on your feet, soldier. You're not gettin' out of this fight that easy.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriend11.vcd"  //Lie still, lemme look. Ah hell, I've seen worse. You'll be allright in a second.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriend12.vcd"  //You're not through yet, kid. Get up and let's go. These shitheads ain't gonna kill themselves.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriend14.vcd"  //Ahh quit snivelling. I've seen worse.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriendA01.vcd" then subject ReviveFriendDown foo:0 -1.216 // You okay?
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriendA02.vcd" then subject ReviveFriendDown foo:0 -0.976 // How ya feelin'?
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriendA03.vcd" then subject ReviveFriendDown foo:0 -0.944 // Can you make it?
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriendA04.vcd" then subject ReviveFriendDown foo:0 -0.993 // You gonna make it?
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriendA05.vcd" then subject ReviveFriendDown foo:0 -1.167 // How bad are you?
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriendA07.vcd" then subject ReviveFriendDown foo:0 -1.136 // How ya doin'?
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriendA08.vcd" then subject ReviveFriendDown foo:0 -1.232 // Can you walk?
}
Rule L4D1PlayerReviveFriendNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerReviveFriend IsNotCoughing  IsNamVet IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsWorldTalkNamVet NotInIntenseCombat _auto_NotSpottedVehicle
	ApplyContext "TalkNamVet:1:2"
	Response L4D1PlayerReviveFriendNamVet
}

Response L4D1PlayerReviveFriendCriticalNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveCriticalFriend01.vcd"  //I can help you up, but I'm not gonna lie to ya - you're in bad shape. If we don't find you some first aid, you're not gonna survive another hit.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveCriticalFriend02.vcd"  //Holy hell, you are messed up. If we don't find you some first aid, you're not gonna survive another hit.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveCriticalFriend03.vcd"  //That really tore the hell outta you. If we don't find you some first aid, you're not gonna survive another hit.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveCriticalFriend04.vcd"  //Holy shit, they took a big piece outta you, kid. If we don't find you some first aid, you're not gonna survive another hit.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveCriticalFriend05.vcd"  //I can help you back on your feet, but it's temporary. If we don't find you some first aid, you're not gonna survive another hit.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveCriticalFriend06.vcd"  //You're in real bad shape, kid. If we don't find you some first aid, you're not gonna survive another hit.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveCriticalFriend07.vcd"  //No shame, kid. I woulda pissed myself, too. But if we don't find you some first aid, you're not gonna survive another hit.
}
Rule L4D1PlayerReviveFriendCriticalNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerReviveFriendCritical IsNotCoughing  IsNamVet IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsWorldTalkNamVet NotInIntenseCombat _auto_NotSpottedVehicle
	ApplyContext "TalkNamVet:1:5"
	Response L4D1PlayerReviveFriendCriticalNamVet
}

{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriendB01.vcd"  //Up and at 'em.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriendB02.vcd"  //Come on up!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriendB04.vcd"  //You'll be okay.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriendB05.vcd"  //I got ya.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriendB06.vcd"  //Up we go.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriendB07.vcd"  //Hell, you're fine.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriendB08.vcd"  //It don't look bad.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriendB09.vcd"  //Come on up.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriendB10.vcd"  //Let's move!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriendB11.vcd"  //You're fine.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReviveFriendB15.vcd"  //You'll be fine.
}

{

}

	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3OTHERBOATS09.vcd"  //Son, that's a trailer and you're an idiot.
}
Rule InfoReminfo_trailerboatNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptInfoReminfo_trailerboat IsNamVet IsNotCoughing NotInCombat IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsWorldTalkNamVet AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival
	Response InfoReminfo_trailerboatNamVet
}

Response InfoReminfo_trailerboatruckNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3SECONDSAFEROOM12.vcd"  //Cut the horseshit, Francis.
}

{
	criteria ConceptInfoReminfo_trailerboatruck IsNamVet IsNotCoughing NotInCombat IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsWorldTalkNamVet AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival
	Response InfoReminfo_trailerboatruckNamVet
}

Response PlayerShotGasCanNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReactionNegative07.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //God dammit
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReactionNegative09.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //Son of a bitch
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReactionNegative10.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //Dammit
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Swears04.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //Bull-frickin-horseshit.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Swears09.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //God DAMMIT.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Swears10.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //Mother of mercy.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Swears19.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //What a crock a' shit...
}
Rule PlayerShotGasCanNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerShotGasCan IsNamVet IsNotSaidPlayerShotGasCan IsScavenge
	ApplyContext "SaidPlayerShotGasCan1:10"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response PlayerShotGasCanNamVet
}


//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Vocalizer Heal
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Response L4D1PlayerCoverMeHealNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/CoverMe01.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Cover me!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/CoverMe02.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Cover me.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/CoverMe03.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Watch my back
	scene "scenes/NamVet/CoverMe04.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Watch my back.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/CoverMe05.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Cover me.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/CoverMe06.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Healin', cover me
	scene "scenes/NamVet/CoverMe07.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Cover me, gonna heal.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/CoverMe08.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Wait up, I'm healing.
}
Rule L4D1PlayerCoverMeHealNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerHealing IsNotCoughing IsNamVet IsNotAskedForCover IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsNotAlone IsWorldTalkNamVet _auto_NotSpottedVehicle
	ApplyContext "AskForCover:1:30"
	Response L4D1PlayerCoverMeHealNamVet
}


//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Volcalize
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Response AutoPlayerLostCallNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LostCall01.vcd"  //Hello?
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LostCall02.vcd"  //Where are you?
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LostCall03.vcd"  //Where is everyone?
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LostCall04.vcd"  //Is anyone there?
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LostCall05.vcd"  //Report in, people! Report!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LostCall06.vcd"  //Hello?
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LostCall08.vcd"  //Anybody out there?
	scene "scenes/NamVet/LostCall09.vcd"  //Is anyone out there?
}
Rule AutoPlayerLostCallNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptTalkIdle IsNamVet IsClosestSurvivorFar3000 IsNotAlone IsNotSaidPlayerLostCall _auto_NotNoLostCall IsNotSpeakingWeight0 _auto_NotSpottedVehicle
	ApplyContext "SaidPlayerLostCall:1:50"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response AutoPlayerLostCallNamVet
}

	scene "scenes/NamVet/SpotWeapons02.vcd"  //Weapon over here!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/SpotWeapons03.vcd"  //Got a Weapon!
}

	criteria ConceptPlayerSpotWeapon IsNotCoughing IsNamVet IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsNotSaidSomeoneDied IsSmartLookAuto IsNotInSafeSpot IsNotAlone IsNotSaidSpotWeapons IsNotSaidSpot IsGuitar IsWorldTalkNamVet IsNotSpeakingWeight0 _auto_NotSpottedVehicle
	ApplyContext "SaidSpotWeapons:1:5,SaidSpot:1:20"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response SurvivorSpottedWeaponNamVet
}

Response L4D1PlayerLighthouseIntro01NamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO47.vcd" then manager C14M1Intro1c foo:0 0.1 //Out here, they're immune, dead or zombies.
}
Rule L4D1PlayerLighthouseIntro01NamVet
{
	criteria ConceptC14M1Intro1 IsNamVet AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival
	Response L4D1PlayerLighthouseIntro01NamVet
}

{

	forceweight 1000

}

Response L4D1C14M2RadioDestroyedNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Swears16.vcd"  //Ah shit.
}

{
	criteria ConceptC14M2RadioDestroyed IsNamVet IsNotIncapacitated IsTalkNamVet IsWorldTalkNamVet AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival _auto_IsTalkingNamVet
	Response L4D1C14M2RadioDestroyedNamVet
}

Response L4D1SurvivorFinalVehicleSpottedBoatC14M2NamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ArriveBoatInitial01.vcd" predelay "12" then any EmphaticArriveRun foo:0 -14.418 //That's the boat! Time to bug out!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/ArriveBoatInitial02.vcd" predelay "12" then any EmphaticArriveRun foo:0 -13.908 //Allright, the boat's here! Let's go!
}
Rule L4D1SurvivorFinalVehicleSpottedBoatC14M2NamVet
{
	criteria ConceptFinalVehicleSpotted IsNamVet IsLastStand2 _auto_IsFinaleStarted
	ApplyContext "_auto_TimerLockA:1:10,_auto_TimerLockNamVet:1:30,_auto_Finale:2:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1SurvivorFinalVehicleSpottedBoatC14M2NamVet
}

	ApplyContext "_auto_TimerLockA:1:10,_auto_TimerLockNamVet:1:30"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1SurvivorFinalVehicleBoatNamVet
}

{
	criteria ConceptGetToVehicle IsNamVet IsLastStand2 IsNotCoughing IsNotIncapacitated IsNotAlone IsTalk AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival IsInRescueVehicle _auto_IsEscapeReady _auto_NotTimerLockA _auto_NotTimerLockNamVet IsNotSpeakingWeight0

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Generic rules to keep track of contexts for all maps (Unless there's a seperate rule for special cases)
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Rule SafeRoomStartNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptTalkIdle IsNamVet IsInStartArea AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival _auto_NotSafeRoomStart
	ApplyContext "Talk:1:45,_auto_SafeRoomStart:1:0,_auto_SafeRoomQuiet:1:5"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response NoResponse
}

Rule IntroEndNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptIntroEnd IsNamVet FromIsNamVet IsNotSaidLeavingSafeArea AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival
	ApplyContext "Talk:0:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response NoResponse
}

Rule LeavingSafeAreaNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptSurvivorLeavingCheckpoint IsNamVet IsNotSaidLeavingSafeArea AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival
	ApplyContext "SaidLeavingSafeArea:1:0,Talk:0:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response NoResponse
}

Rule LeavingSafeRoomNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptSurvivorLeavingInitialCheckpoint IsNamVet IsNotSaidLeavingSafeArea
	ApplyContext "SaidLeavingSafeArea:1:0,Talk:0:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response NoResponse
}

{
	criteria ConceptFinaleTriggered IsNamVet IsTriggeredByNamVet AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival _auto_NotFinaleStarted
	ApplyContext "_auto_Finale:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response NoResponse
}

{
	criteria ConceptFinalVehicleSpotted IsNamVet _auto_IsFinaleStarted _auto_NotEscapeReady
	ApplyContext "_auto_Finale:2:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response NoResponse
}

{
	criteria ConceptFinalVehicleArrived IsNamVet _auto_HasSpottedVehicle _auto_NotEscapeReady
	ApplyContext "_auto_Escape:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response NoResponse
}
